channel.title: 2012 R2 Update on CLOUD DATACENTER & DEVICE MANAGEMENT BLOG
channel.description: Recent content in 2012 R2 Update on CLOUD DATACENTER & DEVICE MANAGEMENT BLOG

item.title: Windows Server 2012 R2 Update
item.description: Microsoft recently released a consolidated update package for Windows Server 2012 R2 and Windows 8.1 Client. this is the new service baseline for Windows Server 2012 R2 systems and it can be either downloaded using Microsoft Download Center or using Windows Update. Microsoft earlier released this update to Microsoft MSDN/TechNet Subscribers and today it will be made available to Volume License customers as an updated Windows Server 2012 R2 ISO media.
